scenario.name: UAS IMS
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[field1] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: "sipp" <sip:[field0]@[field1]>;tag=[call_number] To: "sipp" <sip:[field0]@[field1]> Call-ID: reg///[call_id] CSeq: 7 REGISTER Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0 User-Agent: SIPp
